Reviews.Title: false advertisement
Reviews.Author: rgmpk2
Reviews.Content: For this item they advertise the cellphone in the berry color, however what they actually send instead is a cellphone cover.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Jeana
Reviews.Content: I ordered this about 8 months ago, and it's still going strong. Easy to use, and it has phenomenal battery life. I can typically go about 2 or 3 days without having to charge it. I previously had this phone in blue, but I like the berry color so much better. Not only that, it arrived from this seller before even the earliest estimated date. When this phone eventually dies (which I doubt will be anytime soon), I'll definitely get it again, specifically from this seller.
